description: Has a general understanding of the SDLC concept. Can identify common SDLC models (e.g., waterfall, agile).
high_description: Advocates for effective SDLC implementation and promotes best practices within the team. Can identify and mitigate risks associated with different SDLC models.

description: Has a basic understanding of user stories.
high_description: Effectively utilizes user stories and acceptance criteria to drive product development and ensure quality. Advocates for effective user story management practices.

description: Is aware that software goes through a release process.
high_description: Can participate in the software release process by following defined procedures. Tracks and monitors the release process to ensure smooth delivery.

description: Has a fundamental understanding of testing terminology (e.g., bug, test case). Recognizes the importance of software testing.
high_description: Demonstrates in-depth knowledge of advanced testing concepts (e.g., exploratory testing, shift-left testing). Analyzes test results to identify trends and improve testing strategies.

description: Can vaguely differentiate between QA and QC activities.
high_description: Champions a proactive QA culture within the team, integrating testing throughout the development process.

description: Recognizes the existence of a testing life cycle.
high_description: Optimizes the STLC for specific projects, ensuring efficient testing and timely delivery.

description: Has a general understanding of a QA tester's role.
high_description: Proactively identifies potential risks and suggests improvements to development processes. Mentors and guides junior QA team members.

description: Can name a few different testing types (e.g., functional, usability).
high_description: Stays updated on emerging testing trends and explores new methodologies to enhance testing effectiveness.

description: Knows a bug needs to be reported.
high_description: Analyzes bug reports to identify root causes and suggest potential fixes. Collaborates with developers to ensure timely bug resolution.

description: Has a general understanding of test plans. Knows a test plan outlines the scope and strategy for testing.
high_description: Champions the use of test plans and ensures they effectively guide the testing process. Contributes to improvements in test plan templates and best practices.

description: Knows test cases are used for testing.
high_description: Develops test cases optimized for automation and reusability. Mentors and guides others on best practices for test case writing.

description: Is aware that various documents and files are used in testing.
high_description: Advocates for the use of appropriate testing artifacts throughout the testing process. Proactively identifies opportunities to improve the creation, management, and utilization of testing artifacts.

description: Has a basic understanding of release notes.
high_description: Crafts comprehensive release notes that effectively communicate important information to stakeholders. Collaborates with different teams (e.g., development, product) to ensure accuracy and completeness of release notes.

description: Knows bugs need to be reported.
high_description: Analyzes bug reports to identify root causes and potential workarounds. Collaborates effectively with developers to ensure timely resolution of bugs.

description: Has a basic understanding of creating a test execution plan and recognizes the importance of scheduling test activities.
high_description: Expert in optimizing and strategizing test execution plans for efficient use of resources and effective management of timelines. Provides strategic insights for complex testing activities.

description: Understands the fundamental concepts of smoke and sanity testing, performing basic tests to verify critical functionalities.
high_description: Expert in smoke and sanity testing, offering strategic guidance to optimize these tests for effective validation of critical functionalities. Innovates testing strategies for robust initial coverage.

description: Familiar with basic functional testing techniques and performs simple tests to verify application functionality.
high_description: Expert in functional testing, providing strategic insights to optimize functional testing processes and ensuring thorough validation. Develops advanced frameworks for high-quality functional testing.

description: Understands the basics of regression testing and performs simple tests to ensure recent changes do not negatively impact existing functionalities.
high_description: Expert in regression testing, offering strategic guidance to optimize regression processes and ensuring comprehensive coverage. Develops innovative strategies for high application stability.

description: Familiar with exploratory testing concepts, using basic techniques to explore the application and identify defects.
high_description: Expert in exploratory testing, providing strategic insights to optimize methodologies and ensure efficient defect identification. Develops innovative approaches to enhance exploratory effectiveness.

description: Understands the basics of user acceptance testing, performing simple UAT to verify the application meets user requirements and expectations.
high_description: Expert in UAT, offering strategic guidance to optimize UAT processes and ensure comprehensive validation of user requirements. Develops advanced UAT strategies for high user satisfaction and acceptance.

description: Understands the basics of Performance  Security  Usability  Compatability  Internationalization and Localization  Accessibility  Testing
high_description: Expert in conducting these Performance  Security  Usability  Compatability  Internationalization and Localization  Accessibility  Testing

description: Knows how to use basic bug tracking tools like JIRA or Bugzilla to log and track defects.
high_description: Expert in integrating bug tracking tools with other development and testing tools, optimizing workflows for efficient bug tracking and resolution.

description: Familiar with basic test management tools like TestRail or Zephyr, using them to document and organize test cases.
high_description: Expert in leveraging advanced features of test management tools to optimize test planning, execution, and reporting processes. Provides strategic insights on tool selection and implementation to enhance overall test management efficiency.

description: Understands the basics of manual test case execution tools and can perform simple test executions using tools like Excel or Google Sheets.
high_description: Expert in manual test case execution, providing strategic insights on enhancing efficiency and accuracy in manual testing processes. Develops innovative methods to integrate manual testing with overall QA strategy for maximum effectiveness.

description: Familiar with basic API testing concepts and tools like Postman or SOAP UI to perform simple API tests.
high_description: Expert in API testing, developing comprehensive testing strategies to ensure robust and secure API functionality. Provides strategic guidance on best practices for API testing and tool selection to optimize testing efficiency and effectiveness.

description: Familiar with basic web architecture concepts such as client-server model and HTTP.
high_description: Expert in designing and evaluating web architectures, providing strategic insights on best practices and innovations to enhance web application performance and reliability.

description: Understands the basics of session management and can perform simple tests to verify session handling.
high_description: Expert in session management testing, developing innovative solutions to secure and optimize session handling in complex web applications. Provides strategic guidance on best practices for session management security.

description: Recognizes the basics of URL structures and can identify simple manipulation vulnerabilities.
high_description: Expert in URL manipulation testing, developing comprehensive strategies to protect web applications from sophisticated URL-based attacks. Provides strategic insights on secure URL handling practices and advanced testing methodologies.

description: Understands basic business logic concepts and can perform simple tests to verify business processes.
high_description: Expert in business logic testing, providing strategic insights on optimizing and securing complex business processes. Develops innovative testing methodologies to ensure the integrity and reliability of critical business functions in web applications.

description: Understands the basics of data validation and can perform simple tests to ensure input data is correctly handled.
high_description: Expert in data validation testing, developing strategic solutions to enhance data security and integrity. Provides guidance on best practices for data validation to prevent common vulnerabilities such as SQL injection and XSS.

description: Understands basic Android app testing concepts and can perform simple manual tests on Android devices.
high_description: Expert in developing and implementing comprehensive Android testing strategies, including performance and security testing. Provides strategic guidance on optimizing Android testing processes.

description: Familiar with basic iOS app testing principles and can perform simple manual tests on iOS devices.
high_description: Expert in formulating and executing advanced iOS testing strategies, covering all aspects from usability to security. Provides strategic insights on enhancing iOS testing methodologies.

description: Understands the basics of usability testing and can perform simple evaluations of application modules.
high_description: Expert in designing and conducting in-depth usability studies, providing strategic insights to significantly enhance the overall user experience of application modules.

category: Testing on Different Devices and Platforms
description: Aware of the importance of cross-platform testing and can perform basic tests on multiple devices.
high_description: Expert in cross-platform testing, optimizing strategies to ensure seamless functionality across all devices and platforms. Provides strategic guidance on best practices for efficient cross-platform testing.

description: Knows how to set up and use basic emulators for testing purposes.
high_description: Expert in maximizing the use of emulators for advanced testing scenarios, providing strategic insights on the effective use of emulators to enhance testing efficiency and coverage.

description: Understands basic mobile security concepts and can identify common security vulnerabilities in mobile applications.
high_description: Expert in mobile security testing, developing innovative approaches to protect applications from advanced threats. Provides strategic direction on integrating security testing into the development lifecycle.

description: Recognizes the value of QA certification programs and has explored basic options available in the industry.
high_description: Possesses advanced QA certifications and advises on strategic certification paths for career advancement, promoting continuous learning and professional development.

description: Aware of the importance of networking and has identified a few QA communities and forums.

description: Understands basic leadership concepts and has some experience supporting team leads on small projects.
high_description: Innovates and refines leadership practices, providing strategic direction for QA teams and projects, and promoting leadership development within the organization.

description: Grasps the fundamental concepts and benefits of automation in QA and has basic knowledge of popular tools.
high_description: Pioneers new approaches in automation, optimizing transition strategies, and providing strategic guidance on best practices for integrating and maintaining automation within the QA framework.

description: Understands potential career paths beyond QA and has basic knowledge of related fields such as business analysis and project management.
high_description: Innovates career development strategies, helping professionals successfully transition to and excel in diverse roles beyond QA, and offering strategic advice on professional growth.

description: Understands the need to stay current with QA trends and regularly reads relevant articles and follows key industry sources.
high_description: Drives the adoption of cutting-edge practices and technologies, providing strategic guidance on maintaining competitiveness and innovation in the evolving QA landscape.

category: Gathering the requirements for a dashboard targeted to a small audience
